name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Star Wars: The Force Awakens
description: After the events of Star Wars: Episode VI â€“ Return of the Jedi, the Resistance faces a new threat from the evil Kylo Ren and his army of stormtroopers. Meanwhile, the remains of the First Order must find a way to rebuild and learn from their past mistakes. Rey, a young scavenger on the desert planet Jakku, becomes caught in the middle of these two opposing forces, with a history that holds the key to a thrilling revelation about the Skywalker Saga.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
description: Guardians of the Galaxy, a team of superheroes including a man and a talking raccoon, travel to the far reaches of the cosmos to unite the different elements of a rock and protect the universe from its greatest threat.

name: Black Panther
description: After the death of his father, T'Challa returns home to the African nation of Wakanda to become the new Black Panther. In Wakanda, T'Challa must take control of a technologically advanced, secretive society. Meanwhile, his old friend and a sister who were killed by the dictator and the assassin named Erik Killmonger seek revenge on T'Challa for not taking action sooner.
